topics.title: Sebep Bağlaçları: because, since, as, owing to, due to
topics.content:
Sebep bağlaçları neden-sonuç ilişkisinin 'neden' kısmını işaret eder. YDS/YÖKDİL'de bu bağlaçların doğru kullanımı ve birbirinden ayırt edilmesi kritiktir.

**because**: En yaygın sebep bağlacı, yan cümle kurar. 'I stayed home because it was raining.' (Evde kaldım çünkü yağmur yağıyordu.) Because sonrası tam cümle (özne + fiil) gelir.

**since**: 1) Sebep anlamı: 'Since he was tired, he went to bed early.' (Yorgun olduğundan erken yattı.) Genellikle cümle başında. 2) Zaman anlamı: 'I haven't seen him since 2010.' Bağlama dikkat!

**as**: 1) Sebep: 'As it was getting dark, we decided to return.' (Hava kararıyordu, dönmeye karar verdik.) 2) Zaman (eşzamanlılık): 'As I was walking, I saw him.' 3) Karşılaştırma: 'as tall as'. Bağlam belirleyicidir.

**owing to**: Preposition phrase, isim/isim cümleciği alır. 'Owing to bad weather, the flight was cancelled.' (Kötü hava koşulları nedeniyle uçuş iptal edildi.) Formal/yazılı dil.

**due to**: 'Owing to' ile benzer, isim alır. 'The delay was due to technical problems.' (Gecikme teknik sorunlardan kaynaklandı.) Dikkat: 'due to' genellikle 'be' fiilinden sonra gelir.

**Diğer sebep yapıları**: 'because of' (+ isim), 'on account of' (+ isim), 'for' (çok resmi/eski), 'given that' (+ cümle, göz önüne alındığında), 'in view of' (+ isim, göz önüne alındığında).

**Ayırt etme**:
- because, since, as + TAM CÜMLE (özne + fiil)
- owing to, due to, because of, on account of + İSİM/İSİM CÜMLECİĞİ

**YDS/YÖKDİL ipucu**: Boşluktan sonra tam cümle mi isim mi var kontrol edin. Tam cümle → because/since/as. İsim → owing to/due to/because of.
examples: I stayed home BECAUSE it was raining. (sebep + tam cümle)
BECAUSE OF the rain, I stayed home. (sebep + isim)
SINCE he was ill, he missed the meeting. (sebep + tam cümle)
AS the study was underpowered, the results are inconclusive. (sebep + tam cümle)
OWING TO budget constraints, the project was postponed. (sebep + isim)
The cancellation was DUE TO technical difficulties. (sebep + isim)
Given that the sample size was small, caution is warranted. (sebep + tam cümle)
He failed the exam BECAUSE he didn't study. (sebep + tam cümle)
They succeeded OWING TO their hard work. (sebep + isim)
AS it was late, we decided to leave. (sebep + tam cümle)
The delay is DUE TO unforeseen circumstances. (sebep + isim)
SINCE the hypothesis was supported, further research is needed. (sebep + tam cümle)
ON ACCOUNT OF her expertise, she was chosen. (sebep + isim)
BECAUSE OF limited resources, the scope was reduced. (sebep + isim)
The findings are significant BECAUSE they challenge existing theories. (sebep + tam cümle)

exercises.question: ---- the weather was bad, the flight was delayed.
exercises.explanation: Boşluktan sonra TAM CÜMLE ('the weather was bad'). Because + tam cümle. Due to/owing to/because of + isim.

exercises.question: The experiment failed ---- equipment malfunction.
exercises.explanation: Boşluktan sonra İSİM ('equipment malfunction'). Due to + isim. Because/since/as + tam cümle.

exercises.question: ---- the sample size was limited, the findings should be interpreted with caution.
exercises.explanation: Boşluktan sonra TAM CÜMLE ('the sample size was limited'). Since + tam cümle (sebep anlamı).

exercises.question: The delay was ---- technical problems.
exercises.explanation: 'was due to' yapısı + isim ('technical problems'). Due to isimden sonra kullanılır.

exercises.question: ---- budget constraints, the project scope was reduced.
exercises.explanation: Boşluktan sonra İSİM ('budget constraints'). Owing to + isim.

exercises.question: He didn't attend ---- he was ill.
exercises.explanation: Boşluktan sonra TAM CÜMLE ('he was ill'). Because + tam cümle.

exercises.question: The study was terminated ---- lack of funding.
exercises.explanation: Boşluktan sonra İSİM ('lack of funding'). Because of + isim.

exercises.question: ---- it was raining heavily, the match was postponed.
exercises.explanation: Boşluktan sonra TAM CÜMLE ('it was raining heavily'). As + tam cümle (sebep).

exercises.question: The error occurred ---- a software bug.
exercises.explanation: Boşluktan sonra İSİM ('a software bug'). Owing to + isim.

exercises.question: Given ---- the complexity of the issue, more research is warranted.
exercises.explanation: 'Given that' + tam cümle yapısı. 'Given the complexity' de doğru olurdu (given + isim).

exercises.question: The results are inconclusive ---- the small sample size.
exercises.explanation: Boşluktan sonra İSİM ('the small sample size'). Due to + isim.

exercises.question: ---- her extensive experience, she was appointed as the lead researcher.
exercises.explanation: Boşluktan sonra İSİM ('her extensive experience'). On account of + isim (resmi).

topics.title: Zıtlık Bağlaçları: although, even though, whereas, while, despite, in spite of
topics.content:
Zıtlık bağlaçları beklenmeyen veya karşıt bir durumu ifade eder. YDS/YÖKDİL'de bu bağlaçlar sıklıkla test edilir çünkü öğrenciler sıklıkla karıştırır.

**although**: Yan cümle kurar, 'rağmen' anlamı. 'Although it was raining, we went out.' (Yağmur yağmasına rağmen dışarı çıktık.) Although + tam cümle.

**even though**: 'although' ile aynı anlam, biraz daha vurgulu. 'Even though he studied hard, he failed.' (Çok çalışmasına rağmen başarısız oldu.) Even though + tam cümle.

**though**: 'although' ile aynı, daha gayri resmi. Cümle sonunda da kullanılabilir: 'It was difficult, though.' (Zor idi, yine de.)

**whereas**: Karşılaştırma + zıtlık. İki durumu karşılaştırır. 'X prefers tea, whereas Y prefers coffee.' (X çay tercih eder, oysa Y kahve tercih eder.) Whereas + tam cümle.

**while**: 1) Zaman (eşzamanlılık): 'While I was reading, he arrived.' 2) Zıtlık/karşılaştırma: 'While some support the policy, others oppose it.' Bağlam belirler.

**despite**: Preposition, isim alır. 'Despite the rain, we went out.' (Yağmura rağmen çıktık.) Despite + isim/isim cümleciği.

**in spite of**: 'despite' ile aynı, isim alır. 'In spite of his efforts, he failed.' (Çabalarına rağmen başarısız oldu.) In spite of + isim.

**Diğer zıtlık yapıları**: 'however' (ancak, bağımsız cümle), 'nevertheless' (yine de), 'nonetheless' (yine de), 'yet' (ama, yine de), 'but' (ama).

**Ayırt etme**:
- although, even though, whereas, while + TAM CÜMLE
- despite, in spite of + İSİM/İSİM CÜMLECİĞİ

**Virgül kullanımı**: Although/even though cümle başında ise, ana cümlede virgül kullanılır. 'Although it rained, we went out.' Cümle ortasında virgül gerekmez: 'We went out although it rained.'
examples: ALTHOUGH it was expensive, we bought it. (zıtlık + tam cümle)
DESPITE the high cost, we bought it. (zıtlık + isim)
EVEN THOUGH he tried hard, he couldn't succeed. (zıtlık + tam cümle)
WHEREAS Group A improved, Group B declined. (karşılaştırma + tam cümle)
WHILE the method is effective, it is also costly. (zıtlık + tam cümle)
IN SPITE OF the difficulties, they persevered. (zıtlık + isim)
She passed the exam THOUGH she didn't study much. (zıtlık + tam cümle)
The results are significant, HOWEVER, further research is needed. (zıtlık, bağımsız cümle)
DESPITE limited resources, the project succeeded. (zıtlık + isim)
ALTHOUGH the findings are preliminary, they suggest a trend. (zıtlık + tam cümle)
He accepted the offer IN SPITE OF the low salary. (zıtlık + isim)
WHEREAS traditional methods focus on X, modern approaches emphasize Y. (karşılaştırma)
The hypothesis was rejected, NEVERTHELESS, the study provides valuable insights. (zıtlık)
EVEN THOUGH the sample was small, the effect was significant. (zıtlık + tam cümle)
DESPITE being expensive, the treatment is effective. (zıtlık + being + sıfat)

exercises.question: ---- the weather was terrible, they decided to go hiking.
exercises.explanation: Boşluktan sonra TAM CÜMLE ('the weather was terrible'). Although + tam cümle. Despite/in spite of + isim.

exercises.question: The study was completed ---- numerous obstacles.
exercises.explanation: Boşluktan sonra İSİM ('numerous obstacles'). Despite + isim.

exercises.question: ---- he worked hard, he didn't get promoted.
exercises.explanation: Boşluktan sonra TAM CÜMLE ('he worked hard'). Even though + tam cümle (vurgulu zıtlık).

exercises.question: Group A showed improvement, ---- Group B showed decline.
exercises.explanation: İki grubu karşılaştırma + zıtlık. Whereas + tam cümle. 'Group A iyileşti, oysa Group B kötüleşti.'

exercises.question: ---- the limitations, the findings are valuable.
exercises.explanation: Boşluktan sonra İSİM ('the limitations'). In spite of + isim.

exercises.question: The method is effective ---- it is time-consuming.
exercises.explanation: Boşluktan sonra TAM CÜMLE ('it is time-consuming'). Although + tam cümle.

exercises.question: ---- some researchers support the theory, others reject it.
exercises.explanation: 'While' karşılaştırma + zıtlık: bazı araştırmacılar destekler, diğerleri reddeder. While + tam cümle.

exercises.question: He failed ---- his best efforts.
exercises.explanation: Boşluktan sonra İSİM ('his best efforts'). Despite + isim.

exercises.question: The hypothesis was rejected. ----, the data provide useful insights.
exercises.explanation: 'However' bağımsız cümleleri bağlar (nokta + However + virgül). İki cümle arası zıtlık.

exercises.question: ---- the high cost, the treatment is widely used.
exercises.explanation: Boşluktan sonra İSİM ('the high cost'). Despite + isim.

exercises.question: ---- being expensive, the device is popular.
exercises.explanation: 'Despite + being + sıfat' yapısı. Despite being expensive = pahalı olmasına rağmen.

exercises.question: Traditional methods focus on quantity, ---- modern approaches emphasize quality.
exercises.explanation: Karşılaştırma: geleneksel X, modern Y. Whereas + tam cümle (karşılaştırma + zıtlık).
